name: Run (itch) (FunXD)
description:
Parkour In a Muddy City Drenched In Mystery Available for Windows

Description

Run is a simple parkour where you play as Brad and your goal is to escape many supernatural cities after getting suddenly teleported there. You will have to do increasingly difficult puzzles and parkour to end the game. Many notes are hidden, so maybe you can uncover the mysteries of why this is happening to him.

How To Play

ESC - pause/unpause

Left Mouse Click - Interact

Space - Jump (Able to double jump by pressing space again)

Ctrl - Slide

Left Shift - Hold to sprint

Wall Running - To wall run double jump than hold space to slide along wall

General Tips

Explore to uncover the secrets of the city.

Talk to the NPC to gain power to summon the earth

To better achieve wall run, try to gain the highest height and hold space

Info

Created by: Thanuj Hejitha Karunadhipathi Weera

Game Design Document:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dP73nyqJACBoEperVrv3BZjLDmoxWeVAwdhoRtZCF2E/...
